law.catch_line: While practicing audiology or hearing aid dispensing, an audiologist or a hearing aid dispenser may ...
law.text:
While practicing audiology or hearing aid dispensing, an audiologist or a hearing aid dispenser may not:
Advertise a particular model, type, or kind of hearing aid for sale while intending:
Not to allow an individual who responds to the advertisement to buy the hearing aid advertised; or
To dissuade an individual who responds to the advertisement from buying the hearing aid advertised; and
To obtain for a prospective buyer a model, type, or kind of hearing aid that differs from that advertised; or
Falsely represent the use or availability of services or advice of a physician for providing hearing aid services.
